{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR8054 |revision= |upc=738168035618 |ean= |asin=B00009ETKX |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/11/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2454RT-IT0-U10 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=O7J-GL2454MP-0T |ic_id=550A-15016 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.2 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model=MSP2006 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V643220CT-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2454MP-0T |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Radia |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=USR8054 |default_ssid_regex=^USR8054$ |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:C0:49 |oui_eth=00:C0:49 }} ''802.11g Wireless Turbo Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=8054}} OEM Global Sun GL2454RT-IT0-U10 (GL2454RT-IT0-U10 VER:T1.3) [http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Brecis_SOC Brecis SOC on linux-mips.org] There is an Altera EPM3032A on-board. Appears to [http://www.dslreports.com/forum/remark,16414573 be able to run the same firmware as the USR5450]. ==Images== ===from USRobotics=== File:USRobotics_USR8054.jpg|angled shot File:USRobotics_USR8054_front.jpg|front File:USRobotics_USR8054_top.jpg|top File:USRobotics_USR8054_back.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]] ===board shots=== File:USRobotics_USR8054_board_top.jpg|board top File:USRobotics_USR8054_board_bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
